common:elementaryFlowCategorization.common:category: Emissions to lower stratosphere and upper troposphere

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: CAS number of the metallic form is chosen. Note that this elementary flow is representing also all ions, unless individual elementary flows are differentiated by the to-be-applied LCIA methods, which are then to be preferred. Reference elementary flow of the International Reference Life Cycle Data System (ILCD).
